title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 50-1.5 - Filing and approval of contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 50-1.5 - Filing and approval of contracts

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided by the superintendent, the filing and approval requirements applicable to individual and group annuity contracts and certificates used in connection with group annuity contracts shall, to the extent appropriate, be applicable to individual and group separate account annuity contracts and certificates used in connection with group separate account annuity contracts, respectively. Notes

York State Register August 31, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 35, eff. 8/31/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
